page.title: 19Sunday.
page.content: On a Sunday morning I try to stay in bed for as long as possible because Sunday's are totally boring.When I finally climb out of bed I feed the cat,then I get dressed but I don't have any breakfast.When Mum gets up I ask her if she can make the dinner for 3.00.I ask her that because my programmes start at 2.00 and finish at 3.00,so then I won't get so bored.When I have finally conquered my boredom by playing with a ball,I do a crossword which is in the paper.The reason I get so bored is because there are no activities for children in Corston and no-one my age to play with.At 7.00 I watch programmes until 9.00,then go to bed.Another Sunday gone by.
